channel.title: Iron Storm disk problem.
channel.description:
I finally took my dusty IS disks down to install and play them again. Unfortunetly, something is damaged. The disk itself is perfectly sound, no scratches to speak of, but it doesn't recognize the second disk. It asks for it, but when you place it inside the tray and close it, it just says that it needs disk two again.
Also, it said something about a registration file, and it couldn't locate a .bmp file I believe. It asked if I could find it and I did, but I can't open it. Any ideas on how to fix it? Or should I buy the disks again?

item.title: Iron Storm disk problem.
item.dc:creator: Samapico
item.description:
Maverix26:

No, it’s still illegal, but you really shouldn’t get scared that the feds are going to take down your door and take your ass to jail, it’s pretty unlikely.

Just torrent the game.

Isn’t it like creating a backup copy of your disc? Or asking someone to create a backup copy of your disc for you… it’s the same data If you download a crack to pirate the software, that’s another story.

Read full topic

item.title: Iron Storm disk problem.
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
I just did. Now I cannot change the settings. The game crashes. And I don’t know about you guys, but using the keyboard to play this game is no enjoyable task. Most of the controls are spread around the entire keyboard. If I can’t fix it, thats cool. I might find a new download.

Read full topic

… Download it? No shame in downloading a torrent if you own the original disk… no shame and nothing illegal about it, either.
